LanguageData.VPE_PsyfocusCostFactor.label: psyfocus cost factor
LanguageData.VPE_PsyfocusCostFactor.description: A multiplier on psyfocus cost of psycasts.
LanguageData.VPE_PsychicEntropyMinimum.label: minimum neural heat
LanguageData.VPE_PsychicEntropyMinimum.description: The minimum amount of neural heat. This is increased by maintaining certain psycasts, which give heat that never fades.
